Eric Roos

Eric grew up in Schulenburg, TX and moved to Dallas in 2014 after receiving his undergrad in Computer Science from Baylor University. He now is a software engineer for Teladoc Health. Eric loves travelling side by side with Zack and is constantly looking forward to the next city or mountain escape. His two favorite trips with Zack was the first time in Colarado where we drove the mountains in a lime green Kia Soul. And the surprise engagement trip to New York City.

Zack Thomas

Zack grew up in Blooming Grove TX and moved to Dallas in 2014 after receiving his Bachelors in Excerise Sports Science from Texas State University. Zack has done a lot in Dallas: ranging from Cycle Studio Manager, to Oil & Gas Logistics, to now helping his clients find and purchase the home of their dreams as a buyer's agent for the Dallas Native team here in DFW. Zack loves the gym and travelling with Eric and friends. Zack's favorite moment with Eric was that first trip to Colorado in 2015.
